mapper.sql: SELECT t.id id, t.contract_id contractId, t.contract_no contractNo, t.acc_no accNo, t.contract_amt contractAmt, t.rep_code repCode, t.seq_no seqNo, t.user_no userNo, t.cust_no custNo, t.mortgagee_acc_no mortgageeAccNo, t.create_time createTime, t.modify_time modifyTime, t.mchn_parent mchnParent, t.mchn_child mchnChild, t.result result, t.trade_type tradeType, t.status status, t.rep_msg repMsg, t.pay_amt payAmt, t.rep_code repCode, t.trade_type_parent tradeTypeParent, t.rep_msg repMsg, t.busi_no busiNo, t.loan_platform loanPlatform FROM t_gq_fss_loan t
mapper.select: SELECT t.id, t.mchn_child mchnChild, t.seq_no seqNo, t.trade_type tradeType, t.contract_id contractId, t.contract_no contractNo, t.mortgagee_acc_no mortgageeAccNo, t.acc_no accNo, t.contract_amt contractAmt, t.contract_interest contractInterest, t.pay_amt payAmt, case when t.status='10050007' then '0000' else t.status end repCode, t.loan_platform loanPlatform FROM t_gq_fss_loan t where 1=1

SELECT t.seq_no seq_no, t.mchn_child mchn, t.trade_type trade_type, t.contract_id contract_id, t.contract_no contract_no, t.acc_no acc_no, t.pay_amt pay_amt, t.contract_amt contract_amt, case when t.status='10050009' then '0000' else '0001' end resp_code FROM t_gq_fss_loan t where 1=1

SELECT t.seq_no seq_no, t.mchn_child mchn, case when t.trade_type_parent='11101001' then t.busi_no WHEN t.trade_type_parent='11101002' then t.busi_no else t.contract_id end busi_no, case when t.trade_type_parent='11101001' then '11101001' WHEN t.trade_type_parent='11101002' then '11101002' else t.trade_type END trade_type, case when t.status='10050101' then '0000' WHEN t.status='10050007' then '0000' WHEN t.status='10050009' then '0000' WHEN t.status='10050013' then '0000' WHEN t.status='10050100' then '0000' else t.status end resp_code FROM t_gq_fss_loan t where 1=1

SELECT t.seq_no seq_no, t.mchn_child mchn, t.trade_type trade_type, t.contract_id contract_id, t.contract_no contract_no, t.mortgagee_acc_no mortgagee_acc_no, t.acc_no acc_no, t.contract_amt contract_amt, t.pay_amt pay_amt, case when t.status='10050100' then '0000' else t.status end resp_code, t.loan_platform loan_platform FROM t_gq_fss_loan t where 1=1
where t.trade_type = #{type} order by t.create_time desc
where t.trade_type = #{tradeType} AND t.contract_id=#{busiBidNo} AND t.status!='10050014'

WHERE (t.trade_type = 11100001 OR t.trade_type = 11100002 OR t.trade_type = 11100003) AND t.status = 10050011 order by t.create_time desc
WHERE (t.trade_type = 11090011 or t.trade_type=11090012 ) AND t.status = 10050103 order by t.create_time desc
